column4: hey guys, how do i uninstall office 2007 from wine in 10.04???
not got Wine installed on this computer at the moment, but  applications > wine
and there should be a uninstall program
it wont uninstall at all :(
So  you have tried that?
yes
ok do you haev other programs installed in Wine that you still want? If so what?
none. iw ant to delete all my wine programs
ok this is easy then
view > show > hidden files and folders
in Home
and delete .wine?
yes and then delete .wine
however the menu entry will still be there,  unless you get rid of that as well
how about the file associations?
file associations ?
if i purge wine from apt-get, will it remove all installed program?
no
only config files of some sort I guess, and .wine will still be there
yeah like if i open .docx it will try opening word 2007
no it won't, when .wine is gone
also you can remove  the wine program itself
and if I remember correctly the menu enteries for Wine are in .config
so remove all that and bye bye Wine stuff properly
